A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is\, and i say this with all sincerity\, an absolute slap in the face to long time Star Wars fans. Horrible writing\, horrible plot\, bland characters\, and the complete character assassination of Luke Skywalker.  It feels like a blatant and purposeful execution of all things from the original Lucas made films. It seems incredibly mean spirited and deliberate. Don't waste your time on this one.
